message.body: Hey Miss. I have my car so I can meet you anywhere and get there quickly. :) so let me know! So excited to see you.
Okay! My last meeting is at 3 so I'll head out after that. I'm not sure what time the rehearsal is yet.
I have the rehearsal schedule from Scott and it looks like its at 630 to 10. I'm not sure when they'd start though. I'm like Jeeves from ask Jeeves
Wow thanks! I don't think I'll be able to stay that whole time...are you coming?
I'm not sure. Im going tomorrow for sure. I may just do dinner/happy hour with you.
I probably won't be able to eat or drink anything at a restaurant, but I'm happy to come with you. You pick the place!
Money stuff? We can just hang at a park! Or I can get picnic fixins :)
No, not money. I have an undiagnosed stomach condition. I'll bring some saltines. :)
Oh dear! I can't eat in front of you then!
Sure you can! I'm not even hungry for fancy food anymore.
Oh my god. How long has this been going on?
On and off for months but all my tests have come back normal. I was exaggerating about the saltines. I can eat lots of foods but usually not anything that's high in fat or spices.
Well we can get some picnic food so we can work within the constraints then. Fancy fat free bland whole wheat saltines
That sounds fantastic. :)
Where should I meet you?
My dads in the e.r. An they're probably going to admit him so I think I'm going home unfortunately. Why does fate separate us so often?
Oh my goodness! What?? What happened?
He's been really sick and in and out of the ER the last week
Martha, I'm so sorry. I'll be sad not to see you but you need to be with your family. Is there anything I can do?
Think happy thoughts :)
I will! What is he sick with...?
They don't know but he can't keep anything down so he's been on ivs
That's awful. Poor guy! I'll certainly be sending healing vibes to you all!
